name: VSees
0:
”Alexa, show me bedroom camera”
”Alexa, show the office camera”
”Alexa, turn on office camera”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
ABOUT THIS SKILL
VSees cameras are designed to securely monitor your home or business from the VSees app on your smartphone or computer.

With the skill VSees Camera and Alexa, you can now interact with your VSees cameras by voice. 

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your VSees account* and discover your VSees cameras. Find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa: https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=hp_left_v4_sib?nodeId=201749240

When using the skill, you will need to create names for your devices. There are two ways to create these names:

1. Use the names you previously set up. This will be shown in the VSees app and can be changed.

2. Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add devices to that group. 

More information is available at Create a Smart Home Device Group: https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=hp_left_v4_sib?ie=UTF8&nodeId=201749250

Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can give commands such as:

"Alexa, show me bedroom camera"
"Alexa, show the office camera"

*To use this Skill, you need to specify the name of the desired camera, which can be found and configured in the VSees app.

Compatible VSees Cameras:
-VSees nvr 1080p Home Camera*
-VSees Camera* 
*Requires firmware update
